biography: Lasse is a highly accomplished golfer who calls Tapiola Golf his home club.

He has consistently demonstrated his skill and dedication to the game through his participation in the prestigious Hector Trophée invitational.  Lasse's dedication to the game is evident in his consistent appearances in the tournament, having competed in the 2022, 2023, 2024, and 2025 editions.  While he's yet to claim victory in either the Hector Trophée itself or the individual Victor trophy, his persistent presence in the tournament speaks volumes about his commitment and his unwavering pursuit of excellence.
